entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Calgary
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:37 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Fog, 1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Calgary Int'l Airport 1:24 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Condition: Fog
Temperature: 1.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.6 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 1.1°C
Wind: SE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of drizzle. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of drizzle with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches. High plus 4. Forecast issued 12:24 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 12:24 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
